title: Static friction-claim about acceleration of object

content.prompt: A force of static friction is exerted on an object and is directed to the right. Which of the following statements about the direction of the object’s acceleration is true?

choices.label: The object must be accelerating to the right.
The object must be accelerating to the left.
The object must be at rest and have no acceleration.
There is not enough information to make a claim about the direction of the object’s acceleration.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
